entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning late this evening then changing to periods of rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
